ClassDesc: @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#By_E@ is a utility class which enables the creation of @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#BySelector_E@s in a concise manner. Its primary function is to provide static factory methods for constructing @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#BySelector_E@s using a shortened syntax. For example, you would use findObject(By.text("foo")) rather than findObject(new BySelector().text("foo")) to select UI elements with the text value "foo".
